external_games.name: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom
Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom

name: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom
summary: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom is a 2D action-platformer that combines elements of Shoot 'em up, Beat'em up, and Metroidvania to challenge players. Explore the parallel realm with Fadin and embark on exciting adventures while facing formidable enemies and uncovering hidden secrets.
